00001 module cmfd_header
00002 
00003   implicit none
00004 
00005 !===============================================================================
00006 ! cmfd is used to store diffusion parameters and other information for CMFD
00007 ! analysis.  
00008 !===============================================================================
00009 
00010   type cmfd_obj
00011 
00012     ! array indices([1-x,2-y,3-z,4-g],upper bound)
00013     integer              :: indices(4)
00014 
00015     ! cross sections
00016     real(8), allocatable :: totalxs(:,:,:,:)
00017     real(8), allocatable :: scattxs(:,:,:,:,:)
00018     real(8), allocatable :: nfissxs(:,:,:,:,:)
00019 
00020     ! diffusion coefficient
00021     real(8), allocatable :: diffcof(:,:,:,:)
00022 
00023     ! currents
00024     real(8), allocatable :: currentX(:,:,:,:)
00025     real(8), allocatable :: currentY(:,:,:,:)
00026     real(8), allocatable :: currentZ(:,:,:,:)
00027 
00028     ! flux
00029     real(8), allocatable :: flux(:,:,:,:)
00030 
00031     ! coupling coefficients
00032     real(8), allocatable :: dtilde(:,:,:,:,:)
00033     real(8), allocatable :: dhat(:,:,:,:,:)
00034 
00035     ! core albedo boundary conditions
00036     real(8)              :: albedo(6)
00037 
00038     ! dimensions of mesh cells (xloc,yloc,zloc,[hu,hv,hw])
00039     real(8), allocatable :: hxyz(:,:,:,:)
00040 
00041     ! source probability distribution
00042     real(8), allocatable :: sourcepdf(:,:,:,:)
00043 
00044     ! source sites in each mesh box
00045     real(8), allocatable :: sourcecounts(:,:,:,:)
00046 
00047     ! weight adjustment factors
00048     real(8), allocatable :: weightfactors(:,:,:,:)
00049 
00050     ! core map for xs association
00051     integer, allocatable :: coremap(:,:,:)
00052 
00053     ! eigenvector/eigenvalue from cmfd run
00054     real(8), allocatable :: phi(:)
00055     real(8) :: keff = 0.0_8
00056 
00057   end type cmfd_obj
00058 
00059 end module cmfd_header
